column1: ñande is a Quenya word meaning "a harp". A ñandelle is a "little harp".
Helge Fauskanger has suggested that the forms nandë and nandellë (retaining the same meaning) could be valid Neo-Quenya.Helge Fauskanger
column2: "http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)" at http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion (accessed 25 June 2011)
